name: Rob Crumrine
text: So far, I have been very pleased with the Daniel Creel Agency. We haven't had a lot of need to interact with them, but when we have, it's always been a positive experience!

name: Cameron Gren
text: Daniel was able to get us a better price than we had been paying for YEARS with a competitor, and the coverage was better, too! He is always easy to reach when needed. Very professional but still very friendly. I would highly recommend him to anyone!

name: Jennifer Henning
text: As a Allstate customer I'm happy to say A Job Well Done To All Your Staff and Employees  EVERYWHERE   I Thank You  For keeping US all in Good Hands 👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏

name: trudy edwards
text: I have been very satisfied with the professional conduct and the quick response from the staff at the agency. Everyone that I have spoke with has shown me that their insurance agents are trained to extend only the highest quality and valuable services to their clients.There is an agent ready to help without having to wait.Thank you Daniel and your staff.

name: Jerry Self
text:
My agent (Samuel Salter) has been helpful above and beyond expectations!! If you can, Clone him.
Honestly, he has always represented Allstate with patience and kindness while being helpful.
Thank you.

name: Nicholas Fields
text: Daniel is the best Allstate Agent I've spoken with. He gave me excellent service on my Home and Auto policies, couldn't be more grateful to everything they've done. highly recommend.

name: Oren Mckinney
text: Will definitely have my bike serviced here again.  Service was exceptional.  Everything was explained thoroughly with no hassle and service was done promptly.  Would recommend using these guys!!!

name: Junior Wolff
text:
Purchase a true TaoTao 125 ATV as well as a Kayo 150. They exceeded what the previous dealer in TX sent me..

We went trail riding yesterday and these youth sized atv’s went everywhere that the adult 1000 cc plus atv’s went. Even 3’ of water.

Impressive.

Don’t buy a Chinese bike over the internet that you cannot see, touch or test or you may be like me. Bait and switch and now fighting with the online dealer to take them back.

2 Wheel Heaven had exactly what I needed and now the boys are happy .

That is what counts.

If I could add a pic or video I would to show just how much mud we had on them.

name: Lisa Irwin
text: Very friendly. He worked with me on getting what I needed. Highly satisfied with the customer service and pricing.

resp.text: Thank you very much . We appreciate your business

name: gary duck
text: These people are great.

name: Jerry Pellegrini
text: Fantastic experience, great shop, friendly staff!  Nothing but satisfied!

resp.text: Thank u very much.. I am glad your boys are enjoying the ATVs . Be safe!!!

name: Jonathan King
text: Great first time experience. Will definitely be back in the near future! These guys will take care of you and make sure to answer every question with the proper knowledge and guidance. Super happy. Thanks again 👍👍👍

resp.text: Thank you. We really enjoyed talking with you and look forward to seeing you in the future. Thanks again

name: Tim Smith
text: Good people to deal with

resp.text: Thank u very much..

name: Jason Gray
text: These guys genuinely care about their customers. They have great prices on labor and financing to help anyone. Knowledgeable and very friendly. Highly recommend. A+++

name: Darrick English
text: This is an awesome place !!!! The customer service and professionalism is outstanding! I recommend everyone going through this business . It has been a great pleasure to purchase from you all !!

resp.text: Thank you very much.. We strive to make the experience outstanding.. we appreciate your business

name: Dana Crawford
text: Friendly service and I had my scooter back less than a week, I will definitely be going back to get them to service my bike as well.

resp.text: Thanks very much It was a pleasure hope to see you soon we appreciate your business

name: Daniel BUCKNER
text: I would gladly to business here,  if they don't have what you are looking for they will order it for you or they will go out of there way to find someone that does.  The worker here are very helpful and have a really good attitude!

resp.text: Thank u very much Here at 2 Wheel Heaven Powersports we strive to provide a positive experience and build lasting relationships

name: Air Tech Mechanical Contractors LLC
text: Awesome Deals on 4wheelers, ATV's, motorcycles, and accessories plus I'm very pleased with the service and repairs performed on my Harley at  2 Wheel Heaven. It was a pleasure doing business with you guys, thanks!

resp.text: It is always a pleasure working with you. Thank you for all the positive feedback we really appreciate it

name: Celeste Wilson
text: Great services,went there to get my granddaughter a helmet & the owner took his time to ensure she was comfortable with it & made sure it fitted as need be. I'll most definitely be returning for  the needs for any services needed.

resp.text: Thank you very much and I hope y'all enjoy the helmet

name: Matthew Browder
text: Super friendly staff and a great mechanic. This is the second time I have been for various maintenance stuff and couldn't get back to happier about prices and workmanship .

resp.text: Matthew ---thanks always a pleasure

name: justin mccormick
text: Fast service and a friendly staff. Will continue to do business with them.

resp.text: Thanks very much we appreciate your business

resp.text: Thank u very much we really appreciate it

name: Our New Path
text: Called to compare my current rates with some new ones I got from state farm. Called this office and had to leave a voicemail asking about discounted rates. Never heard back and then they just my coverage without a return phone call. Made the decision to switch fairly easy I guess.

name: SAYMILON GRIFFIN
text: Freda will go to bat for each and every one of her customers.  She has been in this line of business for awhile and knows exactly what to do.  Her experience in insurance needs is evident in how she treats her clients.  She understands how important protecting your assets are and will deliver.

name: Tom McClung
text: Being a new location just starting, I thought there may have been some issues with lack of training or customer service not up to my expectations. I could not have been more wrong. The staff along with Freda Anderson were extremely nice. I explained what I needed and they couldn't have been more helpful. Freda worked hand in hand with my rep Anna McClung and all of my insurance needs were met. I am waiting to sign my boat with them as soon as my other policy expires. I recommend them to everyone!!!

name: Melody Murray Zaragoza
text: Freda is an awesome insurance agent! Her staff are friendly and helpful. Freda does her best to cover your insurance needs.

name: Marie Eubanks
text: Not only do I recommend Freda to my clients but, she handles my family's insurance needs too!!  You won't find any better customer service!!!  Call her for a quote before you commit to any other company!!

name: Adam Hall
text: Freda is very helpful with all of your questions.  She goes the extra mile to help.  Would highly recommend her!

name: Maryse Buck
text: She is very knowledgeable. Able to meet me at a time that was convenient for me. Had all the information I needed.

name: Adrienne Selena
text: Freda is so nice and you'll love her staff!

text: I have had to file two claims recently: one auto and one home. I haven't had to file any claims in the past ten years or so I have had a policy. On the auto the claims department did ok, however they didn't spell out the process very well. I am still waiting nearly four weeks later on an adjuster to come out and look at my home damage. This local agency has done little to help even after promising I would get a phone call. Today the person I spoke with asked if I would wait until tomorrow for another person to come back.

text:
I just filed a claim on my roof.

The adjusters were very professional and Tammy Dickson went out of her way to help me understand the steps of the claim. This claim was handled in a timely manner and they worked with Roof Tech to complete my claim. Great job by both Allstate and Roof Tech.

text: My experience with Allstate, as a new policy holder of their auto and home insurance, has been worry free.  I must admit changing from the other company after 20 years was something I gave some thought, but I knew I needed to do it. Julie who walked me through the process was and is always helpful, quick to respond, and very knowledgeable. She went the extra mile to make sure the transition was a smooth one and made all documents availabe to me.  I highly recommend this agency and Allstate.  The savings for me are great and the excellent protection makes my move way past due.  I found the good hands of Allstate by way of the Lowe agency. Thinking of changing companies, consider the Lowe agency. Thank you Julie, James Lowe, and the entire Allstate company.

name: Michelle Rokavec
text: We were very unhappy with our current provider due to lack of communication and continued non-responsiveness, and decided we needed to make a change. After using the "esurance" site searching 'car insurance', we chose Allstate, and were contacted by them immediately. The agent we spoke with, Olivia, was fantastic! After taking down all the info, we had a detailed quote, with various coverage options, e-mailed to us within minutes. While talking with her the following day about these options, she patiently answered all our questions and clearly conveyed information. Because she was so professional, upbeat, and intelligent, we decided that this is exactly the type of person we wanted to work with. So, besides the car insurance, we decided to move ALL our insurance (Car, Home, and Wind) over to her at Allstate. Buying Insurance is a complex process and never actually 'fun', but it is far more pleasant if you are dealing with an agent and Agency you have confidence in! Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback and support, Michelle. We’re so glad you’re having a great experience with our agency and staff.

Sure enough check my email a few minutes later and Sam has responded.
Josh has a compassion to help and assist his clients in a way that you can tell it’s genuine. They both agree to  prime examples of loving what they do. Thank you for all that you do!!!

name: William & Amanda Edwards
text:
This office is absolutely the BEST!  They are on top of what they do.  Courtney helped me out when we were in a crunch for needing to quickly add an auto to our commercial policy.  She also found where I was lacking coverage that she found important, and made suggestions to improve my current policy.  She stayed after hours to help me make calls that would enable us to get the best rates for the coverage we wanted and needed.
Now that it is time for our personal auto renewal, she was honest and told us to stick with our current carrier for another 6 month period, so that she could get us a better rate when that term was up!  I was so pleased with their honesty!
We will absolutely be shopping our homeowner's policy with them in the future!

We got together with the agent and put us up in a hotel for a few days and then,  he let us rent a house for about 6 months, which was paid by Farmers'.  itself.  When we returned home.  The home had been upgraded beyond our expectations.  We are still living here and still enjoy it immensely.  Farmers' as a company has been absolutely sympathetic to our dilemma and most helpful.  They were prompt in sending us and the contractor the checks so we could get back home as quickly as possible.  God bless the company and the agent in question.

Joseph Thibodeau.

name: Scott Sexton
text: I have worked with Coastal Alabama Insurance for over 2 years and have been pleasantly surprised by their Professionalism and Attention to detail.   After a recent automobile wreck, Coastal Insurance informed me of Diminished Value......I have been driving for more than 30 years and have had 3 or 4 claims during that time.   Not once has any other Insurance Agency ever informed  me of Diminished Value ---- After a claim, most Insurance Companies do in fact pay the claim, but your car is now worth less than it was prior to the accident, even after repairs;  this is obvious to most people.  What is Not obvious or well known, is that Reputable Carriers will also pay you an amount of money, based on a particular formula, in addition to paying for the cost of the repairs.  This additional money covers the reduced value of your car --- but your Insurance Company will not tell you about this.....Reggie, with Coastal Insurance, not only told me about this, but his website even has a calculator for customers to determine the approximate amount of additional money you may be entitled to receive.

resp.text: Your words mean the world to us. Thank you for your trust and business. Glad we could help you out and hopefully our information will help others, whether they are clients or just people looking for professional agents who can help out in their times of need.

name: Sean
text: I'm a 3rd generation Alfa customer.  I've been working with Tyler Ross for some years now.  It's easy to take him for granted.  I'm used to quick friendly responses as my insurance needs evolve over the years.  It's a good feeling knowing that if something ill occurred, Tyler would personally be on the other side of our phone call, watching out for my best interests.  That's just not something you get with most insurance companies.

name: Ruth Hearne
text:
All three women that work there have dismissed all my questions and requests and I've been made to feel it's because I'm a young adult, despite it being my money that I'm using to pay for my car insurance for my own car, that I also bought with my money. However, as soon as my mom goes there for me to ask questions about my account, they answer every questions perfectly with excellent explanations. This has been going on for the past two years I've been with them and has happened twice in the past four weeks. I also don't understand why they keep telling me they're not capable of printing out a breakdown of my accounts and also keep telling me that they have no explanation for changes made to my account. I'm also told that they are incapable of notifying me of any changes made to my account. So I keep finding out that they're overcharging me after the fact. They are very short and rude with me but as soon as my mother steps in they are polite and give her all the answers I have been trying to ask. I have tried to resolve these issues with them multiple times but they refuse to talk to me. They shut down and just keep repeating "I can't do that it's out of my hands" to every single question I have about my account, but they give all answers and explanations to my mom.

Update: I called headquarters today and who I spoke with said "if she can pull up your breakdown on her computer and tell you what's going on with your account there's no reason she cant give that to you." The person at headquarters i spoke with immediately emailed me my breakdown and reviewed it with me in real time. I was also told I should be getting letters in the mail with updates on any and all changes (which i never have gotten and I've been asking this office to fix) so the lady at headquarters made a note on my account for that to be fixed.

text:
We had a terrible experience with Allstate and the Bryan Sheffield agency did nothing to help.   I have been a customer of this agency (policies including homeowner’s, multiple autos, and a boat) for approximately 5 years.  I had a claim due to a flash flood damaging a vehicle.  The claim process was a nightmare, mostly due to working with virtual/out-of-state adjusters (something Bryan’s agency was apparently unaware of).

It took over a month to get the claim settled - currently on day 34 and the claim is still open.  The car was eventually totaled on day 22, but later Allstate decided they would rescind that decision and repair it (after I had purchased a replacement).  Later, they changed again and totaled it.

On day 13, I emailed the office manager and asked that Bryan call me.  I understand the agency does not directly deal with claims, but they can assist and advise where necessary, especially when the process is a bad experience for their customers.  Instead, his office manager called me, provided no assistance, and seemed surprised that Allstate does not have auto adjusters in Birmingham (where this agency is selling auto policies).

According to the multiple solicitation emails I receive weekly, customer service is very important to this agency.  I have emailed Bryan three times and asked that he call me as stated above.  As of today (day 34), Bryan has not called nor contacted me outside of solicitation emails trying to sell me additional products and services.

I eventually had to file a formal Department of Insurance complaint against the company and the agency.  If you make the mistake of choosing Allstate as your insurer, I would highly recommend finding a different agent.

name: Tim Harden
text:
Hurricane Sally damaged my Alabama condominium in September of 2020 but fortunately I was insured through First Baldwin Insurance.  My experience with this team and the Insurance Adjuster has been nothing short of "better than expected".  This being the first time I have ever been involved in a claim of this type and magnitude, I had many questions and concerns, starting with "where to start?".

Immediately after the storm, I received a Claim Number via email with a note saying I would be contacted by an Adjuster "ASAP".  It was so helpful to have the process started for me.  First Baldwin Insurance's team of Valerie Miller and Michelle Thomas were extremely helpful and always provided excellent customer service in addressing my questions and concerns - THANK YOU BOTH!  Not only did they help with this claim, they provided valuable insight for my renewal to even be better protected should a similar event occur.

I worked with both Michelle and Valerie on my initial insurance policy and based upon the results of my coverage, I am extremely pleased with the advice and coverage my policy provided me.  THANK YOU BOTH AGAIN!

The Adjuster, Chris Van Wert of Harbor Claims, was nothing short of phenomenal as well.  After an initial call explaining my situation, I sent Chris details for my claim.  My claim was immediately approved and within days, I received a check.  Chris explained to me how my policy applied to my claim.  When calling Chris, he dropped everything he was doing to assist me. He is extremely customer service focused and very professional.

While having to deal with an insurance claim and the related damages is not pleasant, I wanted to share that my claim experience with Michelle, Valerie and Chris, has been nothing short of phenomenal!  I highly recommend working with these organizations!

Timothy Harden, Gulf Shores, AL

text: I have never had so much trouble getting ahold of not just the agent assigned to me but anyone that could help. I remember emailing Michelle and she ignored every email and call. I never received any further notices or proof of such and have another new agent since and I get it is hard to get a call back after a hurricane but 3 weeks when I Ieft vms and sent emails to multiple reps? Everyone should be used to working remote by now so a damaged building is no excuse. I have heard from other friends in area that they were not happy either with co. so surprised at ratings. All the money I spend in insurance and wind and hail, I get screwed over without an explanation and no coverage for any damages.

resp.text:
Thank you, Jess, for taking the time to give us your feedback. We're sorry that you feel that your experience has not been positive, and we would like to look into the matter further.  Meanwhile, our operations director will be in touch with you before she leaves the office this afternoon.

We acknowledge that you may have recently experienced longer-than-normal wait times when calling our team. Unusually high call volumes and more complex calls stemming from Hurricane Sally-related impacts on policyholders have driven these service delays. We continue to focus on working with our customers to provide flexibility in each unique situation during these extraordinary times.

We’ve already taken aggressive steps to address the delays without compromising our commitment to helping you navigate this challenging climate. We expect wait times will improve over the week or so, returning to normal in November.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

text: What a wonderful experience I had with this insurance company when my home was struck by lightning and had to be totally rewired.   All of the repairs were completed without question and my home looks even better than before. From the insurance adjuster in the field to the good folks behind the desk it was the best experience that it could be under the circumstances.  Thank you Michelle Williams for taking such excellent care of my family!  -Holly H.

name: carmine naro
text: My agent has been Tara, she is the best. She listens to your needs and gets you exactly what it is you're looking for. I have been dealing with this company for several years.  They are A one in my book, but truly thanks to Tara the agent, she is the biggest reason I keep coming back.  Keep up the great work.

name: Jetta Conway
text: The worst ever for customer service.  We have homeowners and vehicles insurance there so we wanted to get life insurance. We called 3 times a week for 3 weeks.  We never got to talk to the agent and she never returned the call out of 9 attempts.  My husband went by there and they said she was not available. Can’t remember her name but she’s the one to talk to about life insurance. We will be moving all of our insurance.  If they won’t return your call to sell it to you, what they gonna do when you need to file a claim.   The worst agent ever and receptionist doesn’t seem to care either about the customer.

resp.text: Hello Ms. Conway. We sincerely apologize for your negative experience when attempting to contact us. Your feedback is exceptionally important to us. As a company, we believe it’s our responsibility to serve the members of our community and provide each and every one of our customers undivided attention no matter what. Admittedly, company protocols were not followed here by the individual who handles the life insurance applicants. Company leadership was able to isolate and address this matter within moments of your review. It pains us deeply that we have failed in our mission with you. We will continue to reach out to you by telephone to express our deepest apologies.

text: Great service. Great atmosphere. Definitely a regular spot for my family!

resp.text: We couldn’t be happier that Marie provided you with a great insurance experience. She is a true asset and we are lucky to have her on the First Baldwin Insurance team. We hope you have a great day.

name: Etta Lea
text: I switched my auto and homeowners over to Lokey a couple of weeks ago. Even though they didn't honor the pricing in their marketing solicitation (hello, bait & switch), I still signed up as I liked the idea of working with a locally-owned agent. After I had cancelled my policies with Geico & Liberty Mutual, I was notified by mail that the Allstate homeowners policy written by Lokey was cancelled. I called Dakota at Lokey in a panic, he indicated that I still had a few days before the cancellation would take effect. He said he would look into the issue and call me back. He never called me back, I had to call him a few days later.  Once again he said he would call me back, but I had to call him back again. He then informed me that because of a zero-payment claim and another minor claim that I can't verify, the only coverage I could get was going to be twice as much as I had been paying with my previous Liberty Mutual policy . Which I had cancelled, because (I thought) I had the new insurance from Lokey/Allstate! I truly regret that I ever responded to that marketing email from Lokey. Dealing with this has been a nightmare.

resp.text: Im very sorry that you had a bad experience. I will be happy to call you tomorrow to discuss.

text: We have been with Allstate for years now. They have always been very quick and responsive to handle our claims. Dakota in particular always always goes above and beyond to make makes sure that we are taken care of and that our plan covers all our properties, vehicles, toys, and life insurances to fit our budget. Highly recommend Dakota Parrish at Lokey Allstate.

name: Lorren Bailey
text: I've been with Bo for 5 years now. He and his team have been so great and helpful through out the years but especially in the last month as I moved my mother over to his services. There was a bit of a mess up (not on Bo's end but there was another agent that "poached" us because they called my mother just as we were moving her stuff over and talked to her as if she was from Bo's office but in the end she wasn't and was basically poaching us from him. I figured it out the next day and called Bo. He and his team got right to work canceling that "other" agent's policy for my mother and after 2 weeks of mild frustration it was all cleared up. I can't imagine having a better team working as hard for my family.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Lorren. We are pleased that we were able to help you get everything straightened out for you and your mom. We look forward to working with you both in the future to service all your insurance needs.

name: Bre'Anna Matthews
text: I wish I could rate a zero. I have been reaching out for help since April and no still waiting on a callback. They changed my policy without me knowing and they placed charges on my account without telling me or telling me where they came from. This office really has to work on communication and professionalize. It’s sad that you can never talk to someone in billing and it’s also sad that the agents always say they will call you back and never do. It’s also sad when you ask every month about charges and no one has answers. I will never recommend this location to anyone, not even my dog.

name: Glenda Jones
text: The representative  Ms. Laconia. ( I hope spelled her right. She was so helpful and detailed down to the point. I give her a 5 🌟.  Thank you All-State again. May The MOST HIGH blessed you in JESUS name🥰🥰🥰🥰

name: Greg Watson
text:
I have been mailing Michelle for several months now to let her know that she has been sending me details of someone else’s account. I live and work in Scotland, and have never been a customer of Allstate.

All of these emails have gone unanswered which - having worked in financial services at a senior level myself for over 20 years - astounds me at the level of disdain being taken with a customer’s data.

I hope that this review, which I was asked to provide by Allstate,  will finally prompt some action on Michelle / Allstate’s part so that the Greg Watson they’re trying to contact is no longer having his financial circumstances communicated to some random from the other side of the planet.

text: Wonderful place to do business with. Tim is the utmost professional with a high degree of character and integrity. Very knowledgeable and ensures you have proper coverage. name: Ben Gilder
text: I've been with Tim for many, many years and never had anything but great service. Amber is great! A couple of weeks ago I had a comprehensive claim. I called Amber and in a little over a half an hour, I had an appointment to have my van towed the next business day. The day after that I received a very fair settlement for my totaled van. Amber is always great and the people in the claims department were also extremely friendly and helpful - Clay and Alexandria

resp.text: Ben-Thanks for letting us know how well the claim went and thanks for the 5 star review.  We are blessed to have a great claims team at Farmers and I'm blessed to have a great staff.  Thanks also for being a loyal client for so many years.  I always enjoy working with you and Marcie...y'all are awesome folks!!  Tim

name: Max Cichon
text:
A Farmer's Insurance client since....1984. Wow, how time flies.
I'm willing to pay a bit more for 5-Star customer service and a friendly face who knows my name. When I have (rarely), a claim, it is acted upon immediately and is taken out of my hands. This company knows what it is doing and while I've heard horror stories about every single one of their competitors, I've never heard anything but praise for Farmer's.
Not much more to say. Worth every penny.

resp.text: Thanks, Max! You and your family have been loyal Farmers customers going on 40 years, which may be a record for one of my clients. It's always fun to visit with you and it's always a pleasure to work with you! You have a great family and I know you are proud of them. Tim

name: Sarah Rawls
text:
Friendly staff and cheap insurance, but...

Unfortunately they couldn't transfer my insurance to be used for a rental car that I needed asap. Also, once I paid $70 and found out they couldn't do what I needed I canceled my policy. I was told that I wouldn't get a full refund even though it's only been one day...that it's prorated and I might get back $20. That all depends on their accounting department. So I asked for that number and was told nobody has it. So basically I wasted $70 dollars and had to find another insurance provider that could do what I needed.

Update...
Due to my post, a member of management tried to reach out to me. At that point, I've talked to several people about the same issue, so I didn't bother responding back out of disappointment and frustration. Surprisingly, I received my refund in the mail. So thank you to whoever it was that had the decency to show compassion especially during these times. Bless you and thank you so much.

resp.text: Hi Sarah, we'd like to help you resolve this issue. Please email us at cs@acceptanceinsurance.com and include your name, account # and any relevant details that will help us serve you better. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Tiffany W
text:
By far one of my worst experiences ever!!! The staff are not helpful and they don't know what they are talking about. I could go on forever about this visit but to make it short, I was forced to cancel my home and auto insurance after being a loyal customer for 8 years. Due all to this visit

I'm still contemplating reporting them to the Better Business Bureau or the government agency that looks into insurance unfair practices. I tried filing a complaint with their company but they gave me  the run around and never contacted me back.

There is a lot more to this story and as a black woman I was downgrated into one of the hottest trends that is happening in America. I felt horrible and sad that I gave them so much of my time and money over the years. The customer service center managers were just as bad.
Oh, I forgot I would make this short. Moral of the story, Please Beware!!

name: Brittany Brown
text:
Update time! I've been with Wendy Burpee for I think two years now? Maybe more! Everyone at this branch is a DREAM. They are SO sweet, so willing to go out of their way to save me a dollar on my plan, that I can't imagine switching for life.

As I learned recently, State Farm is a mutual company (no shareholders), which is a different type of insurance than many other companies, and it absolutely shows in the pricing and the customer experience. It's like the credit union version of insurance (I think! I'm still new to the concept). I know not everyone will get the lower price, but if you haven't tried, seriously give these ladies a call.

OLD review: I'll be honest - I haven't met the agent, and I haven't spoken to anyone in the office at length. But to me, this simply speaks of the efficiency this office is working at. If I have an issue, boom, done by the front desk. Taken care of. Five minutes or less. Need to make an extra payment? Need to change your plan? Need anything? Sure, her team gets it done. They seem pretty courteous in the blips of chats we've had, so I assume they must be pretty solid. Best insurance I've had so far.

resp.text: Oh wow. Brittany! You made our day. I am so glad it shows that making it easy for people to do business with us at the best value we can provide is what we are striving to do. We want every interaction to be an experience that brightens your day a little. Thank you so much for taking the time for such a thorough review!

name: D B
text: We are very particular about the Insurance Companies we deal with.  We seek a personable, trustworthy and easily accessible agent when we look for insurance.  We don't deal with calling and being put in a queue waiting for the "next available associate" who will assist you shortly. If we can't talk to the agent or his assistant every time we call, we find another agent or company to deal with.  With that said...Mark Holley, and his assistant Whitney, are easily reached with a visit, a call or a text.  Mark is always ready to help in anyway possible, for a potential claim, a new property to add or just to make a payment.   We are not just a number or policy to Mark or his assistant.  They promptly return calls and most of the time answer immediately.  Personal service is why we stay with Farmers and the Mark Holley Agency.  This is a great agency to be with and we look forward to continuing to have our insurance needs met Mark Holley, his assistant and Farmers.

name: Crimson Viceroy
text: Mark was very unresponsive when I first approached him in getting a quote for home insurance.  He would not return any emails or voicemails and when an initial introduction was made, it was very mechanical.  Not to mention, that he had no credible information with which to properly gauge what sort of nominal protection I would need for my home.  I am a first time homeowner and you would think that in the insurance business, most agents would be quite adept at offering some really good information regarding protective countermeasures that your home would benefit in having or some good tips on how to help prevent certain problems with the home.  Sure you could Google the information, but then what would be the use of having a "certified and expert insurance agent" like Holley if he refuses to answer questions.  Overall, I would either find another agent in the Farmer's Insurance community or I would simply keep shopping around.  The beautiful thing about free enterprise capitalism is that you're not necessarily stuck doing business with unprofessional and uncaring folks such as Mr. Holley.

name: Marvin Barnes
text: (Bait and switch) I was quoted a certain rate for homeowners insurance on my rental property. I paid the periumum in full for the year.  Then about 3 months later, I was charged more without explanation. So far, the auto and primary homeowners insurance premiums have been as quoted, but it has only been about 6 months.

resp.text:
Mr. Barnes,
Thank you for your feedback. We do appreciate your business. To address your comment that we did a bait and switch, we simply do not do that. Upon further investigation of your comment, I found out that the property is a duplex. We were never told that it was a duplex when we did the initial quote. Every risk is different in some way, it is vitally important that we know everything and disclose everything or it could cause you a problem in the event of a claim. If you feel that this is an error, please call my office and we will be glad to sit down and review the information. I would appreciate it if you would consider revising your score as this is reflection upon our agency. My family has been associated with Allstate for 55 years and we did not get there by misleading our customers.

name: Dianna Gore
text: HOW DO I FEEL ...... NOT GOOD! My experience IS NOT OVER. AND it appears my claim has been closed! My camper trailer was damaged during Hurricane Sally. It' going to cost close to $5,000.00 to get it totally repaired and the adjuster gave an estimate of $3,700.00??? I have pictures to show the gouge in the side of my camper, it goes all the way through to the inside wall. He thinks the materials will cost $144.00???? It's really going to cost around $550.00!! I've been an Allstate customer for over 50 years .......I AM NOT ONE BIT HAPPY. And on top of that, I've received no phone calls from Pete Russell's office, only emails. After 50 years I would expect a little more from my agent!

name: Anna Bryant
text: These guys do a great job. They are always available and patient! Thank you!!!

name: Andrew Davis
text: My wife was in a bad car accident in the fall of 2017 where she was rear ended while coming to a stop by someone at about 50-55mph. The driver that hit her had the state minimum limit ($25K) and my wife’s medical bills exceeded that amount so we filed an underinsured  motorist claim with Allstate foolishly assuming they would pay the claim since we had the coverage and had been paying for it. It’s now over two years later and we are in court with Allstate because they refused to pay our claim. They have probably spent more in legal bills than the $25K limit we have. We have underinsured motorist coverage for this exact type of issue and our own insurance company is going out of their way to not help their own insured. Add to this, at no time have we gotten a call from our agent to ask if there was anything we needed or to even check on my wife. I would in no way recommend Allstate.

name: Jason Wright
text: WORST INSURANCE EXPERIENCE EVER!!!! GIVING 1 STAR ONLY BECAUSE 0 STARS IS NOT AN OPTION! We were solid paying customers and paid 6 months in advance the entire time we had the policy. My wife and I just merged bank accounts...so we contacted our agent and had the account switched to the merged account since we were planning to close the other one out... Allstate told us it was taken care of. Not True! - So we realized something was wrong when we got a notice (which was the 1st notice we had received) stating that our policy coverage had been terminated because of failure to make payment. We called the agent office and informed them that we had received the notice and apparently the amount of time it takes for the bank account changes to take place didn't kick it into effect until they had already tried to auto draft the payment from the wrong account and therefore instead of calling us to let us know, they just sent us a letter after the policy was terminated. So at this point I called to discuss with an agent on the Friday when we found out to see what could be done  because we were supposed to be going out of town and currently had no insurance coverage... I spoke with a very polite office admin in which I asked her to see if there was anything that could be done.... in which she obliged but she informed us that she would need to call the underwriter and make sure they were going to reinstate the policy, which we didn't think would be an issue because we had not had any accidents/accident claims while we had been under the related policy. So we get a call back about 2 hours later that the underwriter was not going to reinstate the policy because during the term of the coverage, my wife had made a claim to have a cracked windshield replaced in which she asked the agent before making the claim and was told that it would not go against us in regards to our policy or premium because it was part of what was covered under the policy that we were paying for. We asked them to see if there was a manager or agency owner that could do anything to correct the situation but apparently our local office manager was on vacation and the other branch managers that were supposedly contacted either weren't really contacted or didn't care because we were never contacted again and ended up having to find a new insurance coverage through a different agency. This was probably the worst I have ever been treated from a customer service standpoint in consideration that we are always good prompt paying customers and the fact that our bill not getting auto-drafted was attributed to Allstate's screw-up and then we weren't notified until our policy had already been cancelled and then they used the most petty excuse to not re-instate our policy. I would not recommend Allstate to anyone...ever.

name: Meshia
text:
have been with Direct Auto for a few years now. They have this amazing lady name Katrina Prince, in the Anniston, Alabama location. When I very first signed up, she helped me make sure I was getting the coverage that I needed. Each year, when its time to renew, I call, but each time I encounter someone other than Mrs. Prince, it always ends up a problem, and me about to cancel and go to another company. Then, I end up either asking for or emailing her, who in turns always corrects the problem, and get me signed right on up. So, I have just decided that, I will contact her when its time to renew each year. Each of my friends with Direct also agree. She actually treat you like a close friend or family member. I have never felt rushed or forced to accept something I did not want. I have had cheaper rates offered, but I think the level of care Mrs. Prince shows to the customers keeps us there. I believe if she left, we would also.  I DON'T THINK THEY GET ANY BETTER THAN MRS. KATINA PRINCE. Thank you for everything you do
my "yearly friend."

resp.text: Hi Meshia, Direct Auto thanks you for taking the time to share your review! We appreciate your compliments on behalf of Katrina Prince. Thanks for your business. Have a wonderful day!

name: Kirsten Coleman
text: I closed in escrow on my house about a month ago,  so I paid almost $1400 up front for my homeowners insurance.  A couple of days ago,  I noticed a pending transaction on my checking account from them. They were pulling the amount out of my account. I called to try and get it handled.  They cannot do anything! So now I have to wait for it to hit my account, get a fee for over draft from my bank, and late fees from all of the other bills that were coming out of that acount that day. I'm supposed to send them bank statements to be refunded. But what do they do before I have the chance. They try to pull it from my account again. And again they can do nothing. My car payment and my credit card payment are coming out of my account today as well.  So looks like I'll have even more late fees. They are an absolute nightmare to work with. Do not trust these people with your bank information.

text: Brad was my agent for 6 years. Started with car insurance, then renters insurance, homeowners insurance, and then my landlord insurance. text: About a month ago, a deer ran out from the mountainside in our neighborhood and hit the side of my car, damaging both of the passenger side doors and knocking out one of the windows.  From the moment we phoned your office to report the accident, to the time when we picked up the car after it was repaired, your office has been great to us.  Your staff is so calming and knowledgeable and assisted us with how to file the claim, what to expect during the process and in general just let us that they were there for us.  That type of service certainly goes a long way in pleasing the customer.  Thank you so very much for your excellent service!

name: 652 tbh
text: Allstate Insurance Agent Brad Johnson is a one a kind Insurance Agent.  He is very thorough with answering any insurance questions needs.  He brought up concerns that I needed to be aware of as a customer/consumer and gave recommendations on other resources that I could use while I make my decision on what type of insurance coverage's I would be needing.  He did not just close the door and say, “We cannot help you.” He took out the time to provide the best options for my insurance needs.  When an Insurance Agent is trying to help you and you do not even have a policy in place just yet, speaks volumes to me.  Let’s just say I had a better understanding regarding insurance coverage's that I never knew about before.  After speaking with Brad, I acknowledged that he had the best interest for me and my family.  I am now an Allstate Insurance client.  YAY!  I have already had to file claims.  Brad and his team have been tremendous with helping me file my insurance claims and getting them processed.  Brad’s knowledge base, welcoming approach, great customer service, professionalism, willingness to execute the best plans for customers is why I highly recommend Brad Johnson and his team to help you with your insurance coverage needs.

name: Bill Clayton
text: I don’t write many reviews but often look at them when deciding on a service or company I am not familiar with. This was the same in this case. We bought a beachhouse in Gulf Shores and our normal insurance company back home wasn’t able to insure the home being so far away. We were recommended to a whitehaven by our realtor for their service and pricing. Honestly the pricing was good but I can not say the same for the service. 9 months ago we had to file a claim for our tile roof that was leaking from a large storm that came through and tore off some of the tiles. 9 months later I’m still trying to get the insurance holder to finish the claim their own adjuster has suggested to fully replace the roof due to the inability to match the tiles. Normally I’d have it fixed myself but no one has been able to find suitable replacements that would even fit. Whitehaven has never once called to check on the claim nor offer any advice nor assistance with getting this completed. So we still have a beautiful beachhouse with a roof that has patchwork to prevent the leaks and reasonable cost insurance that’s absolutely no good. Be careful what insurance you go with ... you just might need it one day. Also be careful who is your insurance broker. Whitehaven is quick to give you a quote and setup the insurance but absolutely no assistance when you really need them. I looked at their reviews before using them initially and wish someone had placed this review so that I would’ve avoided using them to begin with. I sincerely regret having to leave this negative review.

name: victor jolley
text:
So, after 7 years of great service, I no longer want to do business with this agency. They bumped my auto liability to HALF A MILLION DOLLARS back in November. They have dodged, made excuses, etc etc. and still wouldn't take it off. I imagine they will make further excuses after reading this. Tried to cancel policy, but when I call, they put me on hold, then i get hung up on after about 5 min. I put a stop payment on this last bill for the exact amount, which is required to stop the payment. What did they do? After bank stopped the draft, Wiggins agency dropped the amount down, after 6 months of fighting, to original pre half million dollar amount. Then ran it through again! Went through, of course, because it was a diff amount. So now, in addition to being overcharged since November, they have now taken money on insurance I no longer want. I want this money back now, and I want my overcharged money back for the last 6 months!
And I loved these guys. All this because somebody decided to Jack up my policy, then give me the run around on correcting it. SMH.

name: Bonnie Sendejo
text: Michelle Chapin set up my policy and set it up incorrectly. When I responded to an email to inform her of this she ignored me. Then I was charged twice and set up with 2 policies. When I emailed her again directly I was ignored. She finally responded when I sent an email to Craig letting him know my experience with her. I emailed her 3 times asking about a refund and she has yet to respond. I had to call the 800 number to get assistance and was told my over payment was not refunded as I had asked but applied to other policy. The 800 number was able to correct this while I still have be ignored. I would not recommend this office.

resp.text: I understand your concerns and want you to know that we are here to help in any possible way. Please call us at 256-881-1100 or feel free to email me directly at joseph@wigginsagency.com. Thank you so much.

name: Stacy Jones
text: It all started when I bought a brand new Nissan Versa in April, only to have it wrecked a week later in a front-end collision by an uninsured driver. It took me more than a month to save a little money and come up with a second down payment to buy another car. Unfortunately due to the fact that I'd had  two fender benders in the last 3 years that I was at fault for, this third accident theoretically gave Allstate the idea that it was okay to raise my rates to triple what they had been. My new car now cost half of what I had to pay for insurance on  it. I struggled through a few months, stealing from Peter to pay Paul just to make the bills each month. And this on a disability check. Then my neighbor said "call Direct Auto, we got great rates"jj. And I did , thank-you  Kidasha, I am no longer paying more for my car insurance than for my car , I'm no longer stealing from Peter to pay Paul every month to pay the bills and I'm finally able to breathe easy knowing that my check is enough to cover all my expesenses. I cannot begin to tell you how much I appreciate all she's done for me.

name: Sherrie Campbell
text: The visit was a pleasant one. Went with my mom to get wind coverage for her home. The person who waited on us was nice and pleasant. The only thing that gave me cause for pause was the fact that the coverage for items in the home was only covered at 50% of that for the structure as opposed to the 75% that every other company offered. This concerned me. She even asked me/us was that enough. I mentioned that the coverage from Allstate was a greater % based on structural coverage. However, no greater coverage was offered. Otherwise, all went well. As you can see, I've still not come to terms with the 50%, but we paid for the year in full. It's a done deal now... she was nice, but the coverage isn't ideal...

text: BEFORE YOU GET ACCEPTANCE INSURANCE BEWARE IF YOU WRECK WHILE GLANCING AT YOUR PHONE OR TALKING ON YOUR PHONE YOUR CAR WILL NOT BE COVERED. MAKE SURE YOU READ YOUR POLICY CAREFULLY. MY SISTER HAS THIS INSURANCE CURRENTLY AND THEY DIDNT COVER HER BECAUSE SHE PRESS THE SPEAKER BUTTON ON HER PHONE. THE GUY BRYAN SCOTT THAT SOLD HER THE INSURANCE WAS TO FOCUSED ON CHATTING WITH THE GUY AT TALLASSEE AUTOMOTIVE TO FULLY EXPLAIN THE POLICY TO HER . SHE HAD TO CONSTANTLY CALL HIM SO THAT  HE COULD SEND THE EMAIL WITH INSTRUCTIONS STATING WHAT PICTURES HE NEEDED HER TO TAKE. MY OPINION THE SECTION IN THE POLICY ABOUT PHONES SHOULD BE ON THE VERY FRONT PAGE IN BOLD. IF I WAS THE AGENT THAT WOULD OF BEEN THE FIRST THING I DISCUSSED. I GUESS ITS MORE IMPORTANT TO MAKE A SELL THAN EXPLAIN THE COVERAGE

name: GNice
text:
Complete waste of time, called to get a quote at 2:30pm on 5/21 and agent says he will contact me no later than 10am the next day and no call back received so I call around lunch time receptionist says he's out to lunch so I finally get a call back around 3pm telling me they can't beat my current rate because one of their software programs they use is showing I had 2 accidents on my record which was untrue because I've never had a wreck in my life.

I call my current insurance provider who I was insured with at the time of these supposid accidents and guess what? They don't have a record of them either and neither does my local DMV.

The agent was really nice but my god if your using software that gives you obvious incorrect information and your using that information to provide potential customers quotes..i would suggest investing into an alternative.

resp.text: Hello Greg, we are truly sorry to hear about your struggle concerning your auto quote. Insurance can be complicated enough, and we recognize the frustration of an undesirable outcome. We strive to provide the highest quality of service in every interaction with our customers and take any discontent very seriously. Our CEO has reached out and left his personal contact information in order to rectify this situation. We hope to hear back from you.

name: Adam Karsten
text:
I have always used Geico and Progressive for my automotive insurance needs, but recently I was contacted by an agent from this office named Matthew Tompkins. I have never utilized State Farm before, and did some research and found great experiences from numerous people.

I was immediately blown away by the quick and consistent responses from Matthew. He made me feel like I was his only customer, and it was refreshing getting to deal with a local agent rather than the remote 800 number services I was accustomed to.

I had them do a quote, and was greatly surprised at the amount of coverages I could get for home and auto.  Pricing was very competitive, and I was able to obtain extraordinary coverages, along with umbrella, and discovered they can provide coverages for my business as well.

Thus far, I've had a great experience and would encourage others to consider using this office for your insurance needs if you're in Baldwin County. This group seems to truly care about taking care of you and getting you set up with what you want for a reasonable price.

Highly recommended!

Just fyi for any insurance company out there who may see this. resp.text:
Good morning Josh!  First, let me say that I am disappointed in your response and would love the opportunity to discuss your dissatisfaction in greater depth.  Please note that the issue that you are referring to occurred prior to your policy being transferred over to my agency.  My office has done everything we can possibly to do help, but our hands are tied given what has transpired over the months prior to your policy transitioning over to my agency.

We absolutely want to help and I ask that you contact me directly at 256-350-8660 to further discuss your review if interested.  Helping our customers is our top priority and our track record clearly portrays that.

we appreciate you!

name: Marcia Bentley
text: I have been involved with Guide Insurance for more than 20 years (from back when it was the Belew Agency). They have always been extremely helpful, professional, and VERY easy to work with. They've always worked to get me the best rates, and have even suggesting choices among types of vehicles that would be economical to insure. As the years progressed, they company grew, and they, too, progressed with digital accessibility, enabling me to communicate via Internet and text messaging, so that I didn't have to visit the office. I recently contacted them after buying a new car and found that Guide remains the pleasant, helpful, customer-focused company they have always been.

name: jimmy youngblood
text:
Would prefer not to complain on here but I could not find another forum to do so. I’ve used AAA on and off for 20+ years. I’ve always had good service. I initiated a roadside assistance call in Vestavia at approximately 1:50 CST. The original estimated time of arrival was 2:20, then that changed to 3:45 then 4:05. Its 4:15 and still no one has shown up. Someone did finally call and say they were on the way. By the time they get here it’s going to be close to 3 hours before someone shows up. It’s going to be hard for me to pull the trigger to renew my membership if this is the kind of service I should expect going forward.
Update: 4:38 CST- still sitting here waiting

name: David Ferrell
text: Very slow responses, could be much better

name: Shenequa Burks
text: Insurance is awful, I had an accident and because my car was at fault they didn't hesitate to total out my car because it was new. It took forever to get a response and when I did it was again a run around came. I cancelled my insurance policy because I found a cheaper and better quote, so I called in 08/2019 to cancel the insurance along with road side assistance. Now date all the way to 01/03/2020 $162.00 was taken out my account for road side assistance that was supposed to be cancelled in 08/2019. Let's not forget I was quoted a price of $95 dollars on a two year basic because of all the cars on the policy. I called them on the 01/3/2020 and 01/7/2020 and I'm getting the run around again I just want my money put back in my account for a membership that was cancelled last year. It takes them no time to reach in and get the money but takes 7-10 BUSINESS DAYS to give it back. Highly upset I would not recommend them to anybody.....

name: Casey Benefield
text:
Policy is what it is. Got rear ended, and it took 5 days to get a claim number. I did try to get the claim office on the phone immediately at the scene, via the 24/7 "call and report immediately" number on the back of my insurance card.

I have the audio on my dashcam for that where I kept trying, and they gave  me the runaround. Everyone I have talked to locally about this seem to not understand why, and honestly I have no idea why either. Once I got to my local branch, we got a claim number. Easy peasy. Apparently I'm the only person who has ever been told "we're just roadside."

I just hope... that now that I have someone's email and direct number, that we can get through this....

Now, on a previous claim, they had NO issue doing a claim when it was something against me.

I also wanted to ask a simple question, but unfortunately, the person answering the phone acted like a full-stop barrier. They kept on focusing on a different claim, and would not even let me speak about this one.... that I FINALLY got started/a claim number for.

I had to waste more time, drive down there to the office, to ask my question. My question had a short simple answer when I got there. It didn't have to be that complicated.

Vicki (sp?) always treated me right (within AAA's policy at least), but as a whole, AAA's insurance product just plain stinks compared to other policies I had in the past. Vicki is why I give AAA 2 stars instead of 1. I think she was trying her best.

State Farm, who I came from, even though they accused me of false odometer every year (I work from home), they at least gave me a claim number when I called, and they ultimately covered things in the end, like glass, which AAA doesn't cover at all.  I keep learning of things with AAA that are not covered, or just under-insured...

The ultimate irony is, the Missouri AAA was sitting there accusing me of the false odometer thing too... the very reason why I left State Farm. I even ended up going down to the Acton Rd office to drag someone out to the car, so they can look  for themselves. On a modern car, you can't fake the odometer reading like you can on an older car... this is a 2017.

Seems like every time I need AAA for something, even if it is simply to update phone numbers, it's unnecessarily difficult.

Trust is important, and I need to be able to trust that my insurance company will handle things without argument, in the policy, and that the policy is sufficient for incidents like this current one.

I'm frustrated, stressed out, and didn't need all that added on to the fact that a potentially uninsured motorist just rear ended me....

name: noseymom business
text:
When my daughter and I arrived the doors were locked and when I turned to leave a lady opened them and instructed me that all offices are closed, she spoke to me as if I were an inconvenience to her, my daughter I stood outside and this lady scratched our info down but wouldn’t let us in, 96 degrees and you whoever you were refused to let us in. We were both wearing the mandated masks to conduct business in but you didn’t seem to mind as you shut and locked the door back after instructing me to call your office number so I could finish my business with you over the phone.  I was told just a few weeks prior to that I would need to come in and hadn’t received notice of any office closures via email

I called your office only to be told by automated service that you were busy and there were no other customers there waiting, I have forwarded this information to your corporate office and they helped me finish my transaction, by the way, your office wasn’t supposed to be closed to customers. .

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We are sorry that you didn’t have a 5-star experience at our Huntsville Acceptance Insurance location. At the moment we are offering 1:1:1 service in our offices. If there is more than one customer in the office we are asking that other customers either wait outside or in their car. Our agents have been instructed to then invite the new customer in once we have properly sanitized the area. Although we are happy that our corporate office was able to serve you, we are very sorry to see you had this experience at the Huntsville location. Our Territory Manager will be reaching out to you directly to remedy this situation. Your complete satisfaction and confidence in us are of utmost importance and we look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Moneki Brown
text: My husband went to them thinking they was better. He had a wreck June 12, 2019 it’s july 1, 2019 still haven’t heard from them. We called them today waited on hold for four hour to just talk to a live person. We made sure we asked for rental coverage. Come to find out we have rental reimbursement!!!! WHAT IS THAT?????? We pay out of pocket then they pay us later. That not what we wanted what would be the point if we could pay up front we wouldn’t need it. Then they tell us the only pay for 9 days they and we have to pay for the first day. They don’t  pay the taxes either on the rental. Can’t wait to be done with them!!!!!!!!!!!!! And to top it off they say the damage is only 2,800.00 worth but the whole front of his car is smashed and the driver side smashed. Lights on in the inside so it’s not just the body the rim is bent. Now we are talking about a 2017 Kia with well under 10,000 miles.

resp.text: Moneki, we are sorry to learn about your accident and that you had trouble getting through to our claims team. We have confirmed with our claims team that you only have Nation Safe, which is a rental reimbursement that covers 10 days so you will be reimbursed for the rental expense. We would like to apologize for the miscommunication when you purchased the policy regarding how the rental reimbursement works. For your claim, the $2,800 is just an estimate and the body shop you selected will communicate with your adjuster to get a final cost for the repairs. It is our understanding that you have spoken with the supervisor over your claim and you have her contact info so please do not hesitate to reach out to her if you have any additional questions regarding your claim.

name: Shane Medley
text: Horrible experience upon cancellation. Insurance premium on homeowners kept going up every renewal. More than double within 2 years. There excuse was cost to build the home more than double every year. But this isn't the bad part because upon cancellation they required my new insurance company to forward them proof of homeowners and auto and if not done they refused to cancelled my current policy with them. After doing this they then dropped and I thought it was done. They have sent multiple letters to my home loan lender stating no insurance and this was bad enough. Now after a month of proving I never lapsed I get a letter again stating I haven't had auto for over 2 months and they are charging me back charges due to Allstate: Cody Coffey in Centre telling them with multiple letters that my insurance was cancelled and there was no current insurance. Now I am having to write a letter, send in by email, mail, fax, online proof along with my current provider doing the same thing and proving I had this as of day of cancellation. Then to top it off they stated they cancelled me in the letters when I clearly have all proof also that I cancelled. They make it extremely difficult if you leave. I never again will go with these people I don't care how much money I can save. Very HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE! They sucker you in on price with homeowners then jack it up where its more than anyone. Outrageous. They told me when I informed them I would be searching that everyone's rate was going up like this due to the insurance commissioner forcing it. I found this was a complete lie among every provider I spoke with.

resp.text: I am sorry that you had a bad experience with us, I can assure you that it will not happen again. Please give us a call and we will correct our mistake 100%, thank you!

name: Sylvia New
text: We changed over in March of 2015  from another company and one of our vehicles was entered as a 2003 instead of 2000 and when we went to purchase our tag this year (2016) we found out that our tag had been suspended for lack of insurance.  The agent told us that we were the ones in fault because we should have read our cards better.  We were to trustworthy of the agency staff so we are facing the consequences of this.  We ask for a correction but was told by the worker it was not her fault and she would not do anything.  We have contacted the Headquarters.  Just know that we did try to contact Cody Coffey but they would not share his contact information so as of right now he may not know about this problem we have faced because of his worker in the office.

resp.text: Dear Sylvia,  I am sorry that you had a bad experience with us, I can assure you that it will not happen again. Please give us a call and we will correct our mistake 100%, thank you!

text: You know, you often call on your insurance agency when something goes wrong. When something goes wrong, the last thing you want to do is talk to a company. You want to talk to a person. In the 25 years of my adult life that I've been with AllState -- through car accidents, home floods, one marriage, two children, losing my father to cancer, and supporting my husband through cancer -- I call, and I get a friendly voice...not a corporate line. They have been thought partners with me on how to handle crisis.  I feel sorry for my friends who have to fight against their insurance companies through tough times; mine fights with me.  Thanks, AllState

name: Gerecka Dowell
text: Allstate was an okay company to have auto insurance with. I cancelled for cheaper insurance through someone else. I was confused as to why my policy stated a certain amount due and called Delores to cancel and question that. Delores stated I had already been cancelled and refused to explain why and just insisted on telling me I haven’t paid in two months when I had indeed paid. I tried to send screenshots of bank statements and she stated I have already explained this to you, very rudely and stated the payments didn’t go thru. She didn’t care to hear anything I said nor did she care to explain anything further. I checked the Allstate app after getting off the phone with Delores and the amount owed MYSTERIOUSLY changed and it finally showed the policy was cancelled on the date I called, not before. I’ll give this Allstate three stars because aside from dealing with unprofessional staff, the insurance was good and I did however speak with Alice, whom was sweet and went over everything with me. Although no one cared to acknowledge Delores wrongs, Alice had a much better attitude and was much more professional.

Carol Garner

text: I had their insurance for a couple years. Had autopay setup and suspended it to wait for my check to get to my bank account. name: Joey Adair
text:
As a follow-up to Direct Autos reply to my review:
I HAVE CONTACTED YOUR OFFICE AND PROVIDED VERY EXTENSIVE, MATTER OF FACT DETAILS, ALL TO NO AVAIL! I CONTINUE TO RECEIVE MAIL FROM DIRECT YET I CANNOT GET A CHECK FROM THEM! IN RESPONSE TO THE HIT AND RUN CLAIM THAT I FILED OCT.13, 2020, THE CLAIMS "SPECIALIST" OFFERED A (2 SENTENCE) LETTER, ADDRESSED TO ME, STATING I WAS NOT AT FAULT. CLEARLY, THIS HAS HAD ZERO INFLUENCE ON MY AUTO INS. QUOTES! MY AUTO INS. HAS RISEN APPROX. 25% - AND, I'VE ADDED A SECOND VEHICLE TO MY POLICY! SO MUCH FOR LOYALTY!! IN FINAL, I'D LIKE TO REMIND YOU ALL TO REVIEW YOUR POLICY THOROUGHLY. LAST WEEK I DISCOVERED THAT I HAD THE TOTAL PROTECTION PLAN ALTHOUGH I DID NOT REQUEST IT NOR DID I AUTHORIZE DIRECT TO DEBIT FUNDS IN THE AMOUNT OF $450/6 MONTH PERIOD!! THAT'S APPROX. $70/MTH OVER THE PRICE WHICH I AGREED TO AND SIGNED UP FOR! I AM NOW SEEKING LEGAL COUNSEL.
As I was forced to file a claim in my auto policy in October 2020 due to the fact that I was involved in a hit and run while traveling 50 mph. After the new year I began comparing new insurance quotes only to discover that my rates went up (as much) as 25% due to the adjuster reporting the claim as an AT FAULT ACCIDENT. Please note that the only reason I began searching for a new policy was because of the terrible customer service. There's a reason it's CHEAP INSURANCE!! It is...

resp.text: Hello Joey, We're sorry to hear that you were unhappy with your experience. If you would like to provide us with more information, please email us at  DAFeedback@directauto.com with your policy number, full name, address and date of birth so that we can review your policy ahead of time. We appreciate your business and look forward to speaking with you soon. Have a wonderful day!

name: Joshua Walls
text:
I was quoted a price with a multi-car discount when I don't have more than one car and was never told that was part of the price. I never indicated it either since, obviously, I don't have more than one car. The price was used to get me in the door. What is worse, when my bill went up, the agency wouldn't do anything about it. Basic customer service would have been covering the cost(Only $100 over 3 months) and then at renewal, let me decide if I find the price acceptable. They couldn't even do that. I will swap to literally ANY insurance that gives me SAME price or less at renewal just as a matter of principal. They lost $1000 every 6 months over $100.

The lady I spoke too who helped me discover why was very nice and I felt she personally has good customer service.

name: Average Jo
text: Best insurance agency in the area offer homeowners, automobile, life insurance and more.  They are an independent insurance agency and can work with multiple companies and underwriters to get you the best quotes.  For me, it wasn’t just about the price of the quote, it was the knowledge and advice they provided.  I quickly realized my current coverages were not what I needed and this has never been explained to me for years and years with my previous insurance company or other before that.  Another plus, this is a locally family owned and operated business.  Thank you Craig and Natalie for taking care of my insurance needs!

text: Absolutely wonderful people! The guy who answered the phone was a professional man but didn't act stuck up, he answered all my questions and found the best policy for me. Then when I went to physically get the policy, the lady (his daughter?) Was just as nice, even with my 3 year old acting up! They made sure I was getting the best price for what I needed, with all the patience and kindness you wouldn't expect from insurance salespeople.

text: Craig and Natalie are always a pleasure to talk to.
